duties_responsibilities.duty: Maintain and expand the footprint of existing CallMiner clients by managing the customer experience from sales handoff through post-sales onboarding & adoption for assigned customers.
Consult & drive customer program team to identify, plan and execute their company's strategic analytical objectives using standard change management processes.
Provide thought leadership to customers and challenge perceptions, guide them in defining, building, and measuring interaction analytics use cases.
Drive account retention by actively managing renewal process, proactively assessing risk landscape, communicating business value alignment, and developing save and close plans accordingly.
Participate in yearly customer conference and provide input for the direction and agenda of applicable events and webinars.
Mentor CSMs and new additions to the team to allow them to become productive members of the Customer Success organization.
Influence the product roadmap through participation in Product Meetings.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in a business-related major or equivalent work experience
